header.title: ACP Announcements Feed
header.description: This MOD displays a list of the latest phpBB.com Announcements on the main page of the ACP. Each title is linked to the announcement topic.
header.author-notes: Please follow all installation instructions. Support is provided at http://www.phpbbdevelopers.net/. This MOD was created during my free time, and is being released for free. If you feel that this MOD is useful, please consider making a donation to me by visiting my website and clicking Donate. All donations are appreciated, but none are required. A donation of $5 or more will automatically add you to the Contributors group on the forum, allowing for premium support and more.

action-group.diy-instructions: Once all included files have been uploaded to the correct locations and the specified files have been edited as directed, purge the board cache via the ACP. Then, load the main ACP page and there will be a list of the latest announcements. This MOD was created during my free time, and is being released for free. If you feel that this MOD is useful, please consider making a donation to me by visiting my website and clicking Donate. All donations are appreciated, but none are required. A donation of $5 or more will automatically add you to the Contributors group on the forum, allowing for premium support and more.
